sense.gloss: to assume the posture of praying, to press the palms and fingers of both hands together, to do reverence (e.g. before a statue of the Buddha), to pay one's respects
to beg, to make a supplication
to see (something or someone of high status)

sdata.j: ↑飲↑↓の↓み↑過↑↓す↓ぎた！↑顔↑↓か|お↓がむ|くんでる！
sdata.e: I drank too much. My face is swollen!
